item.title: Copy/Paste clipboard broken on Snow Leopard
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: After a recent Apple update, copy and paste quit functioning on my Snow Leopard install.

item.title: Resolving Synergy mouse issues with Firefox after upgrade to Ubuntu 8.04
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: My desktop runs Ubuntu (64-bit) and I use Synergy to drive its keyboard and mouse over to various clients like my MacBook Pro.

item.title: Running Synergy client automatically under Mac OS X 10.5
item.author: Eric Simmerman
item.description: There is a bug in Synergy 1.3.1 causing it to crash when started as a daemon under Mac OS X 10.
